dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2955 IS: To revise the Inland Waterways Trust Fund financing rate.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Casey (for himself, Mr. Alexander, Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Harkin, and Mr. Franken) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To revise the Inland Waterways Trust Fund financing rate.

section.header: Revision to the Inland Waterways Trust Fund financing rate

subsection.text: Subparagraph (A) of section 4042(b)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: The Inland Waterways Trust Fund financing rate is 29 cents per gallon.

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to uses during calendar quarters beginning more than 60 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.
